channel.title: Webclient in web help
channel.description:
Hey, i have a website, and i want to put a webclient on it. i have it all set up and everythign, all i need to to (i think) is make the server a .jar file. on my webpage, the code to put in the webclient looks like this: Code: Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ ok i got that, but what do i have to do to the client? do i have to put it into my webste files? do i have to make it a jar file? how do i make it a jar file if i have to? look in http://rune-help.lt/news.php can some one help me ???? what the error ??? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 03:57:50 am[/size][hr]some one plz help me put client in web page.... plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 04:02:13 am[/size][hr]some one plz help me put webclient on web page ... maybe some one hawe client full on web page .... ????

item.title: Webclient in web help
item.dc:creator: @Universalas Universalas
item.description:
@Universalas wrote:

Hey, i have a website, and i want to put a webclient on it. i have it all set up and everythign, all i need to to (i think) is make the server a .jar file. on my webpage, the code to put in the webclient looks like this:

Code:


Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/

ok i got that, but what do i have to do to the client? do i have to put it into my webste files? do i have to make it a jar file? how do i make it a jar file if i have to? look in http://rune-help.lt/news.php can some one help me ??? what the error ???
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 03:57:50 am[/size][hr]some one plz help me put client in web page… plz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 25, 2008, 04:02:13 am[/size][hr]some one plz help me put webclient on web page … maybe some one hawe client full on web page … ???
